name: Mzilikazi's Gold
description:
This is a college project - we were tasked with creating a Point and Click narrative game with a First Person point of view.

This is my submission for the project and I appreciate any feedback anyone cares to give me.

It is set in the Matopos Hills - a national park just south of Bulawayo, Zimbabwe. As you will see in the game, Matopos is made up of piles of huge granite boulders.

There is a legend surrounding the lost gold of Mzilikazi (king of the Ndebele). This game is focused on finding the gold.

It is only a prototype, and only introduces the player to the environment and game play style.

Enjoy.
